function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor calibration of national epidemic peaks in May and June","Impact":"Under-estimation of cumulative cases","Mitigation":"Improvement of calibration and modeling techniques","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and statistical methods","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists","Owner":"Data analysts, modeling specialists"},{"Description":"Inability to estimate the independent effects of specific NPIs due to overlapping timing","Impact":"Limited understanding of the effectiveness of specific policies","Mitigation":"Development of methods to separate and assess the impact of individual NPIs","Technologies":"Data analytics, causal inference methods","People":"Policy researchers, public health experts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Wide range of basic reproductive number estimates across different regions","Impact":"Differential risk of disease spread across regions","Mitigation":"Tailored interventions based on regional reproductive number estimates","Technologies":"Geospatial modeling, regional risk assessment tools","People":"Local public health authorities, community leaders","Owner":"Public health agencies, regional governments"}]}
